channel.title: Top Stories on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Top Stories on TechnoStreet

item.title: 14 coaches of Suryanagari Express derail in Rajasthan, 24 passengers injured, 12 trains diverted
item.description: 14 coaches of Suryanagari Express derail in Rajasthan, 24 passengers injured, 12 trains diverted The Suryanagari Super-fast train derailed near Bomadda village of Pali district in Rajasthan at around 3:30 am on Monday morning.

item.title: China Protest: People take to streets, protest with blank white paper against Xi Jinping’s zero-COVID strategy
item.description: China Protest: People take to streets, protest with blank white paper against Xi Jinping’s zero-COVID strategy Now the number of active cases in China has crossed 3 lakh.

item.title: Demolition drive carried out at Mahima Gadi
item.description: Demolition drive carried out at Mahima Gadi Dhenkanal: Tension prevailed as the district administration Tuesday carried out an eviction drive on the premises of Mahima Gadi, the seat of Mahima cult, at Joranda in this district to clear encroachments at the controversial Tritiya Bedha.

item.title: Dhenkanal farmers plead for more ‘Airavat’ vehicles
item.description: Dhenkanal farmers plead for more ‘Airavat’ vehicles Dhenkanal: To prevent destruction of crops by elephants and wild boars, farmers in many parts of this district have demanded that more numbers of high-tech ‘Airabat’ vehicles be pressed into service.

item.title: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup
item.description: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup Bhubaneswar: Odisha, the sports capital of India, is yet again ready to host the FIH (International Hockey Federation) Men’s Hockey World Cup 2023.

item.title: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl
item.description: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl Berhampur: A court in Odisha’s Ganjam district Tuesday sentenced a 53-year-old man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping a girl three years ago.
